meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_ftm_domain_model_templatelanguage

languageKey.label: TYPO3-language that should be related to this (Data records have to be generated on the TYPO3 root page. Website language/sys_languag_uid)
Language title (e.g. English)
Language key (e.g. en)
Localization (e.g. en_US.UTF-8)
TYPO3-Sprache die zugeordnet werden soll (Datensatz muss auf TYPO3-Rootseite angelegt werden. Websitesprache/sys_languag_uid)
Sprachen-Title (bspw. English)
Sprach-Key (bspw. en)
Lokalisierung (bspw. en_US.UTF-8)
